notes: Lee Countys Convenience Centers are open to all rural county residents only.  Residents of the City of Sanford or Town of Broadway are not authorized to use the centers. No commercial, industrial or institutional waste is accepted at the centers.

notes: The U.S. EPA estimates that more than 350 million rechargeable batteries are purchased annually in the U.S. Thanks to the environmental commitment of this location, its easy and free to recycle your rechargeable batteries. Look for the recycling box or ask a staff member how you can do your part for the environment.
